stimulusHtml: Which of the following statements about the thermodynamic favorability of the reaction at 298 K is correct?

features.html: When water is added to a mixture of Na2O2(s) and S(s) , a redox reaction occurs, as represented by the equation below.

choicesHtml: It is thermodynamically favorable and is driven by ΔS° only.
It is thermodynamically favorable and is driven by ΔH° only.
It is thermodynamically favorable and is driven by both ΔH° and ΔS°.
